name: api_terrain_Terrain
description: The Terrain component renders the terrain.

properties.name: allowAutoConnect
properties.description: Specifies if the terrain tile will be automatically connected to adjacent tiles.

properties.name: bakeLightProbesForTrees
properties.description: Whether to bake an array of internal light probes for Tree Editor trees (Editor only).

properties.name: basemapDistance
properties.description: Heightmap patches beyond basemap distance will use a precomputed low res basemap.

properties.name: bottomNeighbor
properties.description: Terrain bottom neighbor.

properties.name: collectDetailPatches
properties.description: Collect detail patches from memory.

properties.name: deringLightProbesForTrees
properties.description: Removes ringing from light probes on Tree Editor trees (Editor only).

properties.name: detailObjectDensity
properties.description: Density of detail objects.

properties.name: detailObjectDistance
properties.description: Detail objects will be displayed up to this distance.

properties.name: drawHeightmap
properties.description: Indicates whether Unity draws the Terrain geometry itself.

properties.name: drawInstanced
properties.description: Set to true to enable the terrain instance renderer. The default value is false.

properties.name: drawTreesAndFoliage
properties.description: Specify if terrain trees and details should be drawn. If disabled, this will also disable updates to renderer positions for trees and details. Tree and detail renderer positions will update again once this setting is re-enabled.

properties.name: editorRenderFlags
properties.description: Controls what part of the terrain should be rendered.

properties.name: enableHeightmapRayTracing
properties.description: When this options is enabled, Terrain heightmap geometries will be added in acceleration structures used for Ray Tracing.

properties.name: groupingID
properties.description: Grouping ID for auto connect.

properties.name: heightmapMaximumLOD
properties.description: Limits the Terrain's maximum rendering resolution.

properties.name: heightmapMinimumLODSimplification
properties.description: Limits how simplified the rendered terrain can be.

properties.name: heightmapPixelError
properties.description: An approximation of how many pixels the terrain will pop in the worst case when switching lod.

properties.name: ignoreQualitySettings
properties.description: When enabled, the terrain ignores the terrain overrides set in the QualitySettings.

properties.name: keepUnusedRenderingResources
properties.description: Defines whether Unity frees per-Camera rendering resources for the Terrain when those resources aren't in use after a certain number of frames.

properties.name: leftNeighbor
properties.description: The Terrain tile to the left, which is in the negative X direction.
